as long as cardname is enchanted it can attack as though it didn't have defender
as long as cardname is monstrous it has flying
as long as cardname is enchanted or equipped it can attack as though it didn't have defender
as long as cardname is monstrous it has trample and can attack as though it didn't have defender
as long as cardname is monstrous it has reach
as long as cardname is monstrous it has trample
as long as cardname is monstrous it has hexproof and indestructible
